EmailTemplate.name: 26Sept13:SOI.Invite 1 SOI
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, MBO webinar has newest data on the self-employed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on September 26 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "The Future of Work: Self-Employed Workers Are Americaâ€™s Hidden Growth Engine <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>."
Have you ever wondered how many other people are self-employed? What do they do, how much do they make, how many are women or men? As the independent workforce grows in America, we continue to research the trend in our third annual State of Independence research report. Join MBO Partners' CEO Gene Zaino as he hosts a discussion with Steve King and Carolyn Ockels, Partners at Emergent Research, breaking down the data, demographics and dollars related to the nation's fast-growing self-employed segment. Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/26Sept13SOI_RegistrationPage.html>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
